name: MI Digital Agency
description:
MI is a full-service digital agency focused on delivering smart marketing solutions that blend strategy, creative, technology and experience. We tell your story through engaging content and leverage marketing technology to drive real improvement in lead generation, sales, and user-experience.
Located in Bethlehem, PA between Philadelphia and New York, MI services B2B, Technology, and clients who generally have a longer or more sophisticated marketing-to-sales process. MI Digital generates measurable results and ROI for our clients through branding, content, usability, design, technology, and digital marketing strategies that differentiate brands, elevate online visibility, and engage audiences.
